entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: McCreary 2:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:58 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:58 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
